mapper.select:
with info as (select distinct s.id, s.name, s.phone, s.user_id, s.password, s.status, s.region, s.delete_flag, s.create_by, s.create_on, '${dto.hospital}' as hospital from sys_user s left join sys_user_hospital h on s.id = h.user_id and h.delete_flag = '0' left join hospital_info i on h.hospital_id = i.id and i.delete_flag = '0' where s.delete_flag = '0'
and hospital_name like concat('%', #{dto.hospital}, '%')
) select * from info
and user_id like concat('%', #{dto.userId}, '%')
and name like concat('%', #{dto.name}, '%')

select h.user_id, i.id as hospitalId, i.hospital_name, i.district_name from sys_user_hospital h left join hospital_info i on h.hospital_id = i.id and i.delete_flag = h.delete_flag where h.delete_flag = '0' and user_id = #{userId}
select r.user_id, m.id as roleId, m.role_name from sys_user_role r left join sys_role m on r.role_id = m.id and m.delete_flag = r.delete_flag where r.delete_flag = '0' and user_id = #{userId}
